hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jubair bin Nufair that a man asked Aishah about fasting and she said:"The Messenger of Allah used to fast all of Shaban, and he made sure to fast on Mondays and Thursdays

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى خَالِدِ بْنِ مَعْدَانَ فِي هَذَا الْحَدِيثِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differences Reported from Khalid bin Mad'an in this Hadith
